Frontend.skills: Front-End Blend Developer, XAML, C#, WPF, MVVM, Microsoft Blend, Blend Software Developer, Blend Software Engineer, Blend Software Architect
Frontend.jobDescription:
Front-End XAML C# WPF MVVM Expression Blend Developer

 

Looking for a Front-End XAML, C# WPF, MVVM, Blend Developer to craft front end user experience for expanding product offering. Company designs, develops and maintains the most powerful trading tools on the market. Target users are institutional traders in all asset classes and their front end experience is critical to their market access.

 

The ideal Front End Blend Developer is passionate about detail, appearance and the interactive feel of the application. Frequent iteration to refine the design/interaction and implementation should come naturally. The Front End Blend Developer must have the ability to work collaboratively across multiple teams working on different projects and identify efficient code reuse between them. This is a great opportunity to contribute to the user experience design process at every step. Teams are small and fast paced matching market and customer demands for new features.

 

Responsibilities:

 

-The Front End Blend Developer will work collaboratively on multiple teams to develop concepts, prototypes and front end production code.

-The Front End Blend Developer will produce high quality production-ready front end XAML code working with a C# developer.

-The Front End Blend Developer will produce XAML code to bring to life UX specifications from visual designers.

-The Front End Blend Developer should understand and use existing styles and design patterns as well as develop new, extensible controls including maintaining multiple Style Dictionaries and themes.

-The Front End Blend Developer will design and develop new XAML components using current XAML best practices blending code and design using Microsoft Expression Blend.

-The Front End Blend Developer will create interactive XAML prototypes to proof and test new interactions, visuals, and animations.

-The Front End Blend Developer will iterate on prototype and product quality by testing for and fixing issues.

 

Qualifications:

 

-Working knowledge of Visual Studio, C#, MVVM.

-Skilled at using Microsoft Blend.

-Git, CVS or other version control system exposure.

-Agile development methods.

-Must be able to provide visual and code examples of WPF Front Ends.

-Thrive in fast paced delivery environment; Start-up experience is a plus.

-Must be able to work onsite at the company’s Great Neck, Long Island New York office.

 

Nice to have:

 

-Experience in the financial industry.

-Experience working with a front end team focused on the user experience.

-Linux/UNIX basic shell skills.

-Experience with 3rd party toolkits such as Infragistics, DevExpress or Telerik.

 

Keywords: Great Neck NY Jobs, Front-End Blend Developer, XAML, C#, WPF, MVVM, Microsoft Blend, Blend Software Developer, Blend Software Engineer, Blend Software Architect, New York Recruiters, Information Technology Jobs, IT Jobs, New York Recruiting

. We are a national IT Recruiting Firm / Agency specializing in full-time direct hire Information Technology employment opportunities.


 

Company Will Sponsor Visas! Company Will Relocate Candidates!

Frontend.skills: front end, technical leader, Java, CRUX, AEM, Angular JS, Agile, RESTful API, HTML, Javascript
Frontend.jobDescription:
The Robinson Group is representing a Fortune 500 client who has just opened up a highly visible, permanent role on their Digital/Commerce group. It is an opportunity to work in a company where digital is the driver of the organization.

Career advancement, competitive salary and bonus and excellent benefits. 

Please send your resume to joliver@robinsongroup.com to start the process.

The Senior Front-End Developer/Lead will leverage leading technology platforms to realize business goals, accelerate front end deliverables, and streamline development processes. The individual will influence the use of tools and strategies as they expand across the Digital Landscape.

The successful candidate will have experience working in industries and companies on the leading edge of Digital Experience and Digital Commerce.  The team is looking for someone who is passionate about front end technologies and expert on the future of digital experience platforms. 

Responsibilities & Qualifications


This senior position will provide leadership and technical expertise in Front End Digital Technologies.

Individual is responsible for translating business requirements into technical specifications and building interactive and responsive user interfaces using cutting-edge technologies including Angular.js, Node.js, and HTML5.

Will establish UI/UX development standards and implement best in class tools to make UI/UX development fast and efficient. 

Individual will provide technical leadership for the company's website and other external facing properties. 

Responsibilities include establishing consistency of UI and UX interactions across browsers, multiple devices, build to address performance and asset caching concerns, and address global experience expectations. 

Additional responsibilities include:
Architect and implement reusable front end frameworks to support multi-channel delivery of solutions across Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) and JAVA applications.
Collaborate with the CRUX/Design teams to understand vision and establish a front-end competency that moves at the pace of business.
Define best practice around use of tools, processes, and development standards to streamline the interaction between creative and development teams.
Lead front end architectural improvements and create shared visual components that span services.
Work collaboratively with vendor teams to deliver solutions. Ensure front-end coding standard and best practices are followed by internal and external teams.
Prototype and develop new ideas and participate in the lifecycle of experience development from research to release.
Identify and implement support and front-end testing tools for team.
Provide technical leadership for the development team.

Competencies


The ideal candidate should possess the following qualifications:
7+ years of working experience in rapid product development building web pages / applications using JavaScript, JQuery, CSS, HTML
Commanding grasp of HTML, CSS, Javascript and responsive web design
5 + years of consuming RESTful APIs and WebServices
5+ Advanced experience with Javascript frameworks such as AngularJS (Required), Ember, or Backbone
3+ years of experience with Agile SCRUM
3+ Experience with data-driven product development, analytics, A/B testing, SEO, and accessibility techniques
Advanced knowledge of CSS rules and browser compatibility
Experience with CDN and CMS is a plus
Deep understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and client-side performance considerations
Excellent communications skills, both verbal and written, including good technical writing and interpersonal skills
Knowledge of Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) Platform
Knowledge of SEO/SEM strategies & Adobe Analytics

Educational Required/Desired: 

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, OR equivalent experience and knowledge required.

Our client in San Francisco, CA has an immediate need for a Front End Engineer.

We’re looking for an experienced front-end engineer to work within our small but growing engineering team. Our front-end team is responsible for crafting and maintaining software for our platform, ranging from client-facing applications, in-store services, and internal tools—all written in React (or React Native) using technologies such as Jest, Flow, CSS Modules, Webpack, and Redux.
 

POSITION OVERVIEW 
 
We’re focused on user experience—both for our customers and our product makers. As a front-end engineer, you’ll play a pivotal role in translating this desire into applications that our customers interact with. 
Ideally we’re looking for a seasoned engineer with experience building production-ready applications.
 

RESPONSIBILITIES

•Collaborate with our team to build and maintain client-side Javascript (React) web applications.

•Design testable, maintainable, and scalable application architecture to support the development of complex web applications.

•Integrate with back-end services.

•Work closely with product managers and product designers to deliver outstanding user-experience with obsessive attention to detail.

•Make great UX decisions in the absence of complete specifications.

 
EXPERIENCE
 
•Passion for hardware, retail, commerce, or ad tech.

•3+ years of industry experience as a front-end engineer (a.k.a. UX engineer, front-end developer)

•Fluent in web technologies like HTML, CSS, and Javascript—demonstrated ability to write scalable, well-architected CSS and Javascript.

•Experience developing a medium-to-large, complex web application.

•Demonstrated proficiency implementing  responsive design.

•Awareness of cross-browser compatibility issues and client-side performance considerations.

Frontend.jobDescription:
We are seeking a talented Front End Web Developer who is passionate about building beautiful websites and applications, while delivering high-quality user experiences for our customers and internal users. You will implement and maintain customer-facing, front-end web pages supporting our online eCommerce, Sales, Marketing and Customer Support initiatives. Projects will include extensions and improvements to our existing web sites, development of marketing micro-sites and internal web-based tools. You should be comfortable with creating and implementing modern, responsive, optimized, and SEO friendly visual designs. We are looking for a hands-on, senior level developer that can join our technology team, working along creative designers and server-side developers. This person should be able to hit the ground running, is self-motivated, and can deliver business value in an environment that fosters creativity and imagination.

ACCOUNTABILITIES & PERFORMANCE MEASURES:
Works on our company websites and related projects as needed with an eye for design along with practical web development abilities
Develops, implements and maintains appealing front-end web pages based on market-leading User Experience competencies and design standards while producing clean, documented, semantic code
Collaborates with IT staff, marketing teammates, senior management, external vendors and other project stakeholders for requirements gathering
Coordinates assigned tasks and responsibilities, hitting all deadlines while maintaining the highest standards of quality web development

COMPETENCIES:
BA/BS degree in IT, computer science or equivalent work experience
Minimum 6+ years hands on front-end programming experience using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery, Angular JS, React JS, or similar frameworks
Minimum 2+ years working in PHP based frameworks such as Magento 1 and 2
Prior experience working with ecommerce/transactional based web sites required
Domain expertise in UI/UX best practices
Ability optimize code (HTML/CSS/JavaScript) for maximum performance
An impeccable eye for detail with the ability to match your UI to any design in a cross-browser environment
Capable of debugging CSS & JavaScript using industry standard tools
Translate UI/UX designs and style guides into functional user interfaces, ensuring cross browser compatibility and performance for both desktop and mobile platforms
Must be able to identify and resolve cross-browser compatibility issues
Work with cross-functional teams and participate in design discussions, decision-making and code reviews
Experience using GIT version control system
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
Deep understanding of responsive design principles, application security and related trade-offs
Experience with LAMP, Linux and using SSH access
Comfortable working in Linux-based remote environments such as Amazon Web Services
Proactively scope and present new ideas to improve our website experience
Experience working with MySQL databases and caching systems a plus
International site development including multi-language, multi-currency functionality a significant plus
Prior experience in the retail or jewelry markets a significant plus

QUALIFICATIONS:
Solutions-oriented thinking; always looking for the smart/best solution to a problem rather than jumping at the first answer
A desire to be personally responsible for production-level code and a track record of delivering quality bug-free code on schedule
Personal interest in staying up-to-date on latest trends and best practices
Excellent written, oral and interpersonal communication skills
Experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment
Proven analytical and problem-solving abilities
Highly self-motivated and directed and keen attention to detail
Ability to effectively prioritize and execute competing projects and tasks

We’re seeking an experienced Senior Software Developer Front-End / Full Stack who is passionate about developing product user interfaces for end users in mission critical situations. We’ve assembled a group of world-class business/strategy, product design, technology, engineering, and data science professionals with deep knowledge and experience in counter drone solutions to work alongside you in tackling one of our country’s greatest emerging threats.

Frontend.skills: SPA, Single Page Applications, React, Redux, JavaScript, Front End, Node
Frontend.jobDescription:
We are seeking a Senior Front-End Developer to help build out our new single page web apps (React/Redux) and refactor some of our current non (React/Redux) applications. We're looking for a dynamic individual who can build well-designed, performant and effective front-end web applications that support complex business rules/flows.

You will start by learning from the experiences of our current team and our current offerings and become intimately familiar with our ASP.NET/knockout technology stack. As you improve your understanding of our business logic, you will contribute your React/Redux experiences by architecting and leading your team to develop new web apps to deliver by the middle of 2017.

You will leverage your experience to establish best practices for web development and drive the team and the codebase to a higher level. You will also have the chance to collaborate with architects in the development and implementation of our upcoming Platform as a Service (PaaS), as well as architects from the mobile team that work with the same stack (React Native/Redux).

The ideal candidate will look not only to lead, collaborate, and develop their career, but also be hungry to assist others in the development of their own careers. You’ll have the chance to set the tone of the platform you’ll be working on.

Responsibilities

Within two months of your start, utilize an agreed up technology stack (React/Redux, etc.) to create well-tested, low-latency web apps
Drive front end architectural decisions to develop a maintainable and reliable set of edge applications
Collaborate with other teams to build microservices that can serve many applications and scale independently
Enable our product team to tap into valuable data sources and build incredible features for our customers
Actively participate in all PaaS projects and work together to build high-quality solutions
Present ideas in the form of brown bags to all engineers to help shape our technical landscape
Provide constructive feedback on pull requests to increase code quality

Qualifications


We need developers who share our passion for building cutting-edge web and mobile apps. You should be active in the development community, and be passionate about all things front end. We’ve got the fast pace and agility of a startup along with the scale and security of an established company with thousands of customers. We are looking for candidates who have:
7+ years experience developing single page web applications

1+ years of experience with React.js, Angular 2 is required
3+ years of experience actively writing unit tests for JS 
2+ years of experience leading web or front end application teams
2+ years of experience with C#
Ability to work as a full-stack developer with a keen eye for UI
Experience working in an Agile environment
Strong interpersonal and communication skills
Proficient with C#, ASP.NET, MVC, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, and SQL
BS in Computer Science or equivalent engineering degree

Desired Skills & Experience

2+ years experience with React
2+ years experience with Redux
Exposure to mobile app development
ES2015
Node.js / Express
Leadership and ability to mentor junior developers

What We Value

We do the right thing…for our customers, our company, and each other.
We see around corners and into the future. We anticipate needs, thinking two steps or even twenty-two steps ahead.
We value diversity. We are inclusive, valuing a variety of perspectives.
We work together to get it done. We are a team - we accomplish more by working together than as individuals.
We take our work seriously, not ourselves. We have fun, celebrate our victories, and enjoy each other's company.

In order to provide equal employment and advancement opportunities to all individuals, employment decisions at EMS Software will be based on merit, qualifications, and abilities. EMS Software does not discriminate against any person because of race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin, ancestry, disability, veteran status, age or any other characteristic protected by law.

Front-end Engineers work closely with product, design, UI / UX, support and back-end development teams to build and improve all aspects of our user facing experience.

The ideal candidate for this role is passionate not only about front-end web development technologies and but also about building and maintaining a highly usable, visually appealing and intuitive user interface for our clients.

Create new and maintain/refactor existing client-facing interfaces using modern development practices.
Collaborate iteratively with product and UI/UX teams to translate business requirements into projects with established requirements and scope that have an achievable and sustainable schedule for development.

• Have implemented a living style guide.

Frontend.skills: JavaScript AngularJS Frontend UX React NodeJS HTML CSS Git MVC
Frontend.jobDescription:
Frontend Software Engineer

 
Software Technology Group is looking for a highly motivated and skilled Frontend Software Engineer to join our team. The Frontend Engineer will need to have heavy experience and proficiency in JavaScript, React, Nodejs, and AngularJS. If you’re passionate about utilizing new exciting technologies and you want to be apart of a team who is driven and dedicated to delivering clean quality code on time, to ensure customer satisfaction, we would love to see your application today.
 

Job Duties and Responsibilities:

Bring new features to life by collaborating with internal teams, including UX and backend teams, to ensure product requirements are met

Participate in code reviews from other developers to ensure quality, stability, and overall architecture of our code base

Research and prototype to provide insight about potentially beneficial technologies and specific industry solutions.


 

Skills - Experience and Requirements

5+ years of Front-end development experience

5+ years of experience with HTML5, CSS, and Javascript

3 + years of AngularJS, React, and Nodejs experience

Solid understanding of custom directives, services, and MVC design patterns.

Experience with contributing to a project using Git.

Ability to understand and then convey front-end development patterns and best practices.

Strong communication and problem-solving skills.

Self-starter with the ability to pick up new technologies quickly

A strong grasp of computer science fundamentals, design patterns, and software engineering principles

A positive and proactive attitude toward finding solutions, meeting commitments, and assisting others

A desire to work in a team environment to learn and to solve interesting and challenging problems


 

Education Requirements

Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science or equivalent engineering experience


 
 EEO POLICY

It is the policy of Software Technology Group, Inc. to assure equal employment opportunity to its employees and applicants for employment by fitness and merit without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, disability, sex, age, gender identity or sexual preference. STG, Inc. seeks to follow this policy in recruitment, hiring, promotion into all classifications, compensation, benefits, transfers, assignments, tours of duty, shifts, layoffs, returns from layoff, demotions, terminations, and training. Consistent with this policy, STG is committed to the employment and advancement of qualified minorities, women, individuals with disabilities, special disabled veterans, veterans of the Vietnam era, recently separated and any other veterans who served on active duty during a war, and persons of all ethnic backgrounds and religions according to their abilities.

Frontend.skills: Java Front End Developer
Frontend.jobDescription:
Java Front End Developer Summary:


Signature Consultants is currently seeking several Java Front End Developers for full-time opportunities in Charlotte, NC. These positions will sit in the uptown area. These are permanent positions that offer competitive wages and benefits.  Applicants must be able to work on a W2.

US. citizens/Green card ONLY due to government or federal requirement.



We are looking for a Java Front End Developer with extensive experience in Responsive Web Design to assist as we transform our customer facing website to a responsive experience. Responsibilities include working closely with designers to turn their designs into a Global UI code base that will be the foundational layer for UI development across the Enterprise.

The ideal candidates should have the following experience:


Someone very experienced with java, spring, hibernate, etc

Someone very experienced in front end (specifically Angular2+ but other HTML5, javascript, etc)

Someone with a mix/interest in both - maybe they've done some basic java but then focused heavier on front end

Angular.JS Experience

Database Experience

Java Experience


Required Behavioral & Communication Skills:


Must have the ability to work in a team. 

Must be able to help communicate ideas and best practices to more junior developers. 

Must be able to collaborate with wider groups on standards and best practices.


About Signature Consultants, LLC


Headquartered in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, Signature Consultants was established in 1997 with a singular focus: to provide clients and consultants with superior staffing solutions. For the seventh consecutive year, Signature was voted as one of the "Best Staffing Firms to Work For" and is now the 14th largest IT staffing firm in the United States (source: Staffing Industry Analysts). With 26 locations throughout North America, Signature annually deploys thousands of consultants to support, run, and manage their clients' technology needs. Signature offers IT staffing, consulting, managed solutions, and direct placement services. For more information on the company, please visit www.sigconsult.com.

Frontend.skills: Front End Developer
Frontend.jobDescription:
Client Overview:


Our client is an award-winning digital platform presenting unparalleled security awareness training solutions. Their integrated, comprehensive, and groundbreaking approach propels them to the forefront of the industry.

 

Position Overview:


In this role, you would be responsible for creating all front-end deliverables, such as user stories, wireframes, user personas, and site maps. You would also be responsible for partnering directly with clients to achieve their goals and present strategic solutions.

 

Responsibilities:


• Develop all front-end deliverables, including strategic user stories, user journeys and flows, user personas, wireframes, site maps, and content inventories

• Work directly with clients to meet their needs, achieve their objectives, and meet user goals; present strategic concepts for client review

• Collaborate with cross-functional internal and external partners clients to ensure the project focus surrounds  the integrity of the experience 

• Remain current of emerging web technologies and design trends; provide strategic recommendations to enhance deliverables

• Implement user-centered design and usability; resolve any front-end issues that may arise

Key Qualifications:


• Bachelor’s degree

• 4+ years’ web development, PHP, and WordPress experience

• Proficient with Adobe Creative Suite, HTML, CSS, SASS, and Bootstrap

Frontend.skills: Front End Developer, Typescript, JavaScript, Angular, CSS, API, Agile, CMS
Frontend.jobDescription:
Front-End Developer 

A tremendous opportunity for a Front-End Developer to join a full-service digital experience agency!
You will be doing front-end development in an Agile environment. Some of the projects will include, content management systems, mobile applications, responsive and adaptive web applications, eCommerce sites, and more. We seek a developer who has a passion for technology and learning and can help bridge gaps between concepts, designs to technical implementation. An ideal candidate will like to code for fun in their free time! 
This is a collaborative environment in which you can see the outcome of your work and grow your skill set. This is a full time position located in a top of the line office space in Buckhead. This is a fantastic opportunity to work with multiple Fortune 500 brands and trusted partners!We have a kickball team, Pac-man machine, fully stocked beverages in the office, and casual work environment.
Required Skills: 


2+ years of Front-End Development - Typescript or JavaScript

Experience in Angular (version 2 or 4) OR VueJS OR React

Experience with CSS Preprocessor - Sass OR LESS

Experience working with APIs

Experience building highly polished responsive user interfaces using HTML/CSS/JavaScript across desktop and mobile browsers

Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment

Exposure to a CMS - Sitecore or WordPress or CrownPeak or Kentico or Adobe Experience Manager (AEM)

Exposure of build toolchains like Webpack, NPM, Gulp, Grunt, or similar

Git and other version control systems

Passion for technology and learning

Excellent communication skills - ability to participate in client meetings

Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science

Must be authorized to work in the U.S. / Sponsorships are not available Contact: 404.843.6965 jobs@visionairepartners.com

Frontend.skills: UI, Front end, React, Redux, Angular, Node Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, AngularJS, NodeJS
Frontend.jobDescription:
Sr. Front End Developer 


The applicant should have a strong Javascript, HTML, and CSS background and have experience working for a web-scale SaaS software development company. This role requires someone with a deep understanding of JavaScript and how to best optimize web applications to achieve rich and fluid interaction. We’re looking for someone who understands the importance of abstraction and who gets excited about the latest JavaScript and CSS frameworks. This person should also be able to provide guidance to other developers in their day-to-day development tasks, and help make architectural decisions regarding a given problem. 

Responsibilities

Deliver front-end website strategy and development (including but not limited to responsive, eCommerce, and mobile development), content management system integration and administration.
Work with marketing, designers and back-end developers to bring incredible to the world
Make sure that our front end is always a step ahead, through modern design principles
Code efficient, maintainable, scalable and cross-browser compatible CSS.
Support the design and development process through creation and improvement of style guides and pattern libraries.
You make sure our organization maintains its cutting-edge and leader status by familiarizing yourself with new technologies and keeping an eye out for upcoming trends and their applicability to our site.

Required Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities:

Comfortable with JavaScript, AngularJS, HTML and CSS
Git experience (specifically feature branch, pull request, CI workflows)
Deep JavaScript knowledge (good and bad parts)
A love for all things CSS3
HTML5 semantic architecture
Experience solving issues for high-pixel density displays
Test driven development or the desire to learn it
B.S./B.A. in Computer Science or equivalent experience

Additional Expertise Preferred:

Mongo, Redux, React etc.
Experience with MySQL
Deploy enterprise software systems using industry standard environments

Frontend.skills: 3-4+ years of Professional Front-End Web Development experience.
Frontend.jobDescription:
Front-End Web Developer


Location: San Diego, CA 


 


One of our clients in San Diego is looking to hire a highly talented Front-End Web Developer. They have asked us to assist them in their search for this important position.  A detailed description of the position is listed below.

 

No 3rd Parties please. Candidates must be able to work in the U.S. without sponsorship.


 

Position Description:


Our client is looking for a Front-End Web Developer with Angular 2+ experience who brings an innovative, creative, and disciplined approach to developing consumer focused products and applications. As a member of our client’s Web team, you will be expected to create artistically rich, valid and standards-compliant code that focuses on delivering the best possible user experience to all of their customers.

 

Primary Responsibilities: 


Build and maintain cutting edge, state-of-the-art web applications and sites that support, attract and retain our client’s customers


Provide web development for a variety of application development projects


Maintain, as a part of the team, all of the company’s current and upcoming web sites.


Regularly interact with all levels of internal customers, including producers, user experience designers, artists, and community relations managers


Keep abreast of web technologies, limitations, and the best techniques to overcome them


Self-manage multiple projects in a fast paced and high production team


Estimate project delivery and meet deadlines


 

 

Required Educations, Skills and Experience:


Bachelors degree


3-4+ years of Professional Front-End Web Development experience.


Candidates must have previous web development experience using Angular 2+


Strong Angular 2, Node.js, Typescript experience is a must


Strong HTML/HTML5 skills with code level experience and a keen understanding of valid markup


Strong JavaScript skills. Must possess the ability to write your own functions, understand how to work with browser events and various data types like arrays and objects, http requests, JSON, forms, closures and modules, including the use debugging tools (Object oriented experience is a plus)


Experience with other JavaScript libraries and frameworks, jQuery, Underscore, AngularJS, and working with external APIs (like YouTube, Facebook or Twitter)


Strong CSS and CSS3 experience with an understanding of cross browser inconsistencies and responsive frameworks (Bootstrap preferred). Experience with CSS processors LESS and SCSS.


Understanding of website development best-practices, the ability to create minimal documentation and follow style guides for various languages like CSS, JavaScript etc.


Understanding of SEO best-practices and how social media is used to promote content


Experience building and maintaining large web sites in a corporate environment.


Experience with various build processes – Maven, NPM, Node.js.


Experience with version control – Perforce, Git, SVN or similar.


Experience with Adobe Photoshop, slicing images, creating sprites and optimizing images for the web to create pixel perfect layouts.


Must be organized, self-starting and precise, producing accurate work with minimal need for oversight and supervision.


Ability to work under stringent deadlines and meet frequent short timeline goals


Organization and ability to adapt to shifting priorities, sufficient to handle multiple projects at various stages.


Must be able to reliably follow instructions delivered, either orally or via a design brief


Must have the ability to analyze problems, propose solutions, and drive issues to resolution


Candidates must possess excellent communication skills.


 

 

Beneficial Qualifications (But Not Required):


Experience with content management systems


Experience with Java template engines like Velocity or other (or similar technology)


Experience with web analytics (such as Google or Omniture)


Experience building and maintaining single page web applications


Strong understanding of web security and various vulnerabilities.


Experience developing mobile web applications, or developing apps for iOS or Android


 

 

Candidates will be asked to share their portfolio of code samples, prior web sites or Git repos.

 

Candidates must be able to work in the United States without sponsorship.

 

For immediate consideration, please email a MS Word or PDF version of your updated resume to Veronica Barcelo at vbarcelo@theprosourcegroup.com. Veronica can also be reached directly at (619) 319-0909. Thank you for your time and consideration.

 

Veronica Barcelo

Senior Recruiter

The ProSource Group

(619) 319-0909

vbarcelo@theprosourcegroup.com

Frontend.skills: Front End Developer
Frontend.jobDescription:
Mastech Digital
 provides digital and mainstream technology staff as well as Digital Transformation Services for leading American Corporations. We are currently seeking a Front End Developer 
for our client in the IT- Services/IT-Software 
domain. We value our professionals, providing comprehensive benefits, exciting challenges, and the opportunity for growth. This is a Permanent 
position and the client is looking for someone to start immediately.

 

Duration:
 Permanent

Location: 
Remote

Compensation:
 Best Market Rates

 

Role: 
Front End Developer


 

Role Description:
 The Front End Developer 
would need to have at least 3-5 years of experience. As the Front-End Developer, you will be working within a highly experienced implementation team to develop identity and access management solutions for the clients. This includes customization of existing product interfaces and development of in house applications.

 

As the Front-End Developer, you will be responsible for working within an implementation team to build solutions designed by the team. This includes reviewing client needs, reviewing architecture and design documents, and implementing solutions utilizing current web technologies (i.e., HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Ajax, Backbone, Angular, and Bootstrap). 

 

You will be involved either directly or indirectly in requirements definition, design, implementation, testing, go-live, and transition to support. For this position, you require to have strong personnel and time management skills as well as excellent verbal and written communications skills. 

 

Responsibilities:


 

- Create and define business, functional and application architecture designs as per business requirements.

- Coordinate with the implementation team to verify the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.

- Develop new user-facing interfaces and features.

- Build reusable code and libraries for future use.

- Integrate front-end and back-end aspects of the web application.

- Develop application dashboards utilizing existing or new frameworks.

- Participate in continuous learning (both formal and informally).

- Travel as necessary.

 

Required Skills:


 

- Strong Web development skills (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AJAX, Angular, Bootstrap).

- Experience integrating JavaScript libraries and frameworks, such as Backbone, Handlebars, Angular, lodash, form2js, d3, dimple, etc. is desired.

- Familiarity with RESTful web services.

- Experience with jQuery or an equivalent JavaScript framework.

- Experience with Jira and agile development techniques.

- Command line experience with the Linux operating system is a MUST.

- Strong analytical abilities, resulting in quick problem resolution.

- Strong desire to learn and curiosity to understand how and why things work.

- Demonstrate strong collaboration, communication, and teamwork skills.

- Comfortable working within distributed global teams.

- Ability to meet deadlines, proactively.

- Excellent written and spoken English communication.

- Values teamwork and can contribute to the group.

- Ability to exercise judgment in the absence of defined procedures and practices to determine appropriate actions.

- Be responsible for quality and timeliness of own work.

- Unafraid to share opinions in a constructive professional way.

 

Desired Skills:


 

- Experience with web markup, including HTML5, CSS3/4.

- Understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX.

- Experience working with cross-browser compatibility issues.

- Experience working with code versioning tools, such as Git/ Mercurial/ SVN.

- Experience with one or more database systems, such as MySQL, MS SQL, Oracle, MongoDB, OrientDB.

- Understanding of Agile software development.

- Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image.

- Familiarity with tools such as Gimp or Photoshop is a plus.

 

Experience and Qualifications:


 

- 3-5 years web development experience implementing features rich SPAs.

- Recent experience writing Rich Client Applications with JavaScript frameworks, such as Angular.js, Backbone.js, Node.js or Ember.js.

- Bachelor’s degree in CIS/MIS a plus.

 

Education:
 Bachelor’s degree

Experience:
 Minimum 3-5 years

Relocation:
 No, this position will not cover relocation expenses

Travel:
 N/A

Local Preferred:
 Yes

 

We are looking only for candidates willing to join us directly as W2 employees 


 

Recruiter Name: Simran Walia


Recruiter Phone: 877.884.8834 (Ext: 2023)


 

EOE



Minimum Education Required: Bachelor

Years of Experience Required: 3-5 Years

Expected Travel Time: None

Frontend.jobTitle: Manager of RF IC mmwave Engineering - RF Front end, CMOS, mmWave
Frontend.skills: RF Front end, CMOS, mmWave, HFSS - RF Front end, CMOS, mmWave, HFSS
Frontend.jobDescription:
Minimum Required Skills:
RF Front end, CMOS, mmWave, HFSS

If you are a Manager of RF IC mmwave Engineering with experience, please read on! This role is a Sr technical contributor role at the  Principal/Senior Manager level, You will be responsible for design and implementation of RF-based ICs with package, antenna and waveguide co-design requirements. He/she will create detailed task plans for design and qualification of RF-based ICs and modules and drive implementation on a strict time schedule.

What You Will Be Doing

1. Design and model an RF-front end in CMOS processes based on the requirements of antenna interface, package and specific application.
2. Co-design package/module and RF IC to meet RF link, cost and mechanical requirements.
3. Develop new RF architectures and set specifications for different RF and analog blocks and identify trade-offs between different architectures.
4. Develop design, verification and lab bench test methodologies for digital/analog/RF sub-blocks considering DFM and DFT requirements.
5. Develop test infrastructure for RF tests for- die probe, socket, packaged IC parts etc.
6. Create detailed test plans to validate solutions for bench characterization and for volume production.
7. Execute and stand behind the qualification of the product, from a mass production perspective, in consumer electronic devices.

What You Need for this Position

7+ years of experience in implementing and productizing RF-based ICs for consumer/enterprise applications.
Expertise in modeling and characterizing packages, antennas and RF front-ends, implemented in CMOS processes.
Expertise with RF and mixed-signal design and verification methodology.
Experience with RF transceiver architectures and RF CMOS IC development for Wifi, WirelessHD, WiGig or 802.11ad.
Expertise with package and silicon co-design for RF ICs is preferred.
Experience in using one or more of the following tools-RF Spice simulation tools, HFSS, ADS momentum, SONNET, or CST for EM modeling and analysis is a plus.
Extensive hands-on experience with RF test equipment- VNA, PNA/PXI series, signal generators, spectrum analyzers, power meters etc.
Team player with interest in filing up gaps in product development, as needed.
Master's degree in EE/CS or equivalent, Ph.D. preferred.So, if you are a Manager of RF IC mmwave Engineering with experience, please apply today!

Front End Web Developer

Develop innovative software solutions in direct support to unconventional warfare clients. Create intuitive and innovative front end Web applications for use across the DoD and intelligence community. Leverage the latest technologies and frameworks, including Node and Angular or React or Vue in a DevOps pipeline. Create intuitive visualizations of large scale data and analytics using strong user experience principals. Engage with multiple functional groups to comprehend client challenges, prototype new ideas and new technologies, and help to create solutions to drive the next wave of innovation. -5+ years of experience with using HTML and CSS, including CSS frameworks, such as Bootstrap or Foundation 

-3+ years of experience with developing front–end applications using JavaScript and a JavaScript framework, including Angular, React, and Vue

-Experience with server–side application development using languages, including Java, PHP, or Python

-Experience with using Agile software development methods in a DevOps environment

Frontend.jobDescription:
Client Resources Inc
. is a leading IT consulting company serving clients throughout the Midwestern United States. With a principal market in the greater Omaha area, CRi prides itself on our top-of-the-line customer service to our corporate clients and our employees. We have partnered with a client in Omaha, NE, searching for a FrontEnd JavaScript Developer | Permanent, Direct Hire position, Based in Omaha, NE. 


 

ABOUT THIS COMPANY: 


A pioneer of software that made the hard work of running a distribution business easier.  Dedicated to the building materials industry who loves serving the industry.  All of their energy and resources are focused on helping them better serve their customers.  Offering competitive salary, comprehensive benefits, bonus program, onsite fitness center, wellness program and casual dress just to name a few.  A casual company that works in a team environment to produce outstanding software and provide unparalleled customer service.  Come see what it’s like to work for an innovative company and what it means to be a member of their family!

 

Looking for a FrontEnd JavaScript Developer
 to join the web application development team.  As a key member of the team, the FrontEnd JavaScript Developer
 will work on a cross functional Agile Development team with the primary responsibility of developing and testing web applications.

 

Product Summary:
 Client has several products geared towards the building material industry. This role will work with the web application team building ancillary applications that extend to users beyond the core users of the Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software, Agility.  Today this includes two main products, Building Results CRM
 and Fleet Management.
  This is a growing division and presents a unique opportunity get in near the ground floor and help accelerate our momentum in the market.

 

Job Responsibilities:

Design, code and test features and other application components to meet the needs of the business
Ensure the web application works well across various devices from desktops to mobile
Assist with the UX design of our web applications
Writing clean, modular and testable JavaScript code
Translate requirements into stable, working, high performing web applications
The web programmer will operate as part of a cross functional Agile team. The day to day activities will be identified and prioritized by the product owner for that team.
The team will meet daily to decide the highest priority work items and complete working, tested and production quality software before moving on to additional work.
Web programmers will be part of the team process of working with the product owner to estimate and break down the highest priority work item into smaller stories that can be completed within one iteration.
Team members are expected to leverage their primary skill area, but be open to learning and helping with other skill domains with the focus on getting the team's work complete.
Collaborate with team to decompose features into small pieces of working software that can be completed in a single iteration.

 


Requirements of Qualified Candidate:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, Engineering or related technical field required or on pace to complete your degree by Summer 2018
1-2 years of experience developing web and/or mobile applications with JavaScript, CSS, CSS3, HTML4, HTML5, Ajax, JQuery and other broadly used web development technologies
Experience with Responsive Web Design
Experience with JQuery and JQuery mobile
Experience consuming JSON APIs in client-side frameworks and knowledge of cross browser issues
Desire to build awesome user friendly web and mobile applications
Ability to take feedback in stride with the end goal of building the best, easiest to use product, for our end users
Working knowledge of Agile Process
Experience with one or more server-side stacks
Experience developing hybrid mobile applications, specifically with Cordova, not required, but desired
Experience working with NativeScript and Angular, not required, but highly desired
Clear communication - must be comfortable and willing to openly discuss work items within a cross functional team

 

US Citizens, Permanent Residents, Green Card Holders and those authorized to work in the US are encouraged to apply.  We are unable to sponsor H1B candidates at this time.  


 

Apply now to CRi's FrontEnd JavaScript Developer position!  Those based in Omaha, NE are highly encouraged to apply.

:

Since 2004, we have deployed hundreds of high performance analytics applications over web and mobile platforms, built several advanced analytics models, processed petabytes of data using Big Data technologies and delivered several high impact business solutions. Driven by our vision of delivering great customer experiences, we are looking for professionals who are passionate about making the world a better place by leveraging the power of data.

As a Senior Java Front-End developer, you will be working with geographically distributed teams, as a key member of the Custom Development practice at InfoCepts to help conceptualize, architect, implement and deliver innovative solutions leveraging latest web technologies for multiple concurrent projects.

Primary Responsibilities

 
Leverage the latest technologies and frameworks
Create intuitive visualizations of large scale data and analytics using strong user experience principals
Engage with multiple product owners to comprehend functional challenges, prototype new ideas and new technologies, and help to create innovative solutions.
Determining the strategic and tactical direction of the front-end architecture of the projects/ products.
Architect from the ground up in a collaborative environment. Design and implement features that wow and excite our clients and end users.
Mentor junior engineers, which may include performing code reviews.
Collaborate with multiple teams in brainstorming, designing and implementing new solutions.
Suggest tools, technologies, and best practices to improve stability, performance and site quality.
Help us to staff, grow and maintain a world class engineering team.

 


Required Background & Experience

4-99 years of development experience with a strong focus on building innovative Front End Solutions
A portfolio of Rich front-end UI development is required.
Very good understanding of design patterns, UI Architecture frameworks is a must.
Deep understanding of browsers, HTML, CSS, Javascript, AngularJS 2 is extremely important.
Experience building end to end Enterprise UI Solutions is a big plus.
Experience with Build-Release, NodeJS, Configuration Management and Unit testing experience also are big plus.
Experience in JQuery, React or any other UI development framework, Twitter Bootstrap is highly desirable.
Exposure to a global delivery model and proactive communication is required.
Experience in writing technical specifications and ability to share knowledge.
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related area

Frontend.skills: Front-End Web Developer
Frontend.jobDescription:
Onebridge is actively seeking a Front End Web Developer located in Fishers, Indiana .

 

Job Title: Front End Web Developer

Address City: Fishers

Address State: IN

Country: US

Zip Code: 46037

Address Country: US

Employment Type: Contract to Hire

 

 


Front End Web Developer Overview:

The Front-End Web Developer will bring UI coding expertise to the Navient’s Customer Servicing website. The web site is responsive by design, built to render optimally on multiple device types based upon Bootstrap’s 960 grid system, and architected in MVC (Model-View-Controller) pattern. The developer will be responsible for the design, and development of website pages. They will translate design mockups into usable HTML/CSS for responsive web pages that render properly across different breakpoints and platforms (Chrome, IE, Safari, Android, iOS). Our website must comply with 508 and WCAG accessibility requirements, so experience with JAWS/ARIA tags is a plus. The developer will also evolve our responsively designed web properties, focusing on innovations in the digital landscape and adopting the website to new devices as they are adopted by our end users.

 

Major Job Duties and Responsibilities:

The developer should have an understanding in both agile and waterfall software development life cycle, and be prepared to participate in all phases of the SDLC (requirements analysis, high level design, detailed design, coding, unit test, code migrations) helping to create and review deliverables. The developer must be highly motivated and focused on completing tasks efficiently with high quality. Additional responsibilities may include assisting with code reviews, developing deliverable estimates, and coordinating software enhancements.

 

 

General Education/Experience/Skills:

• Expertise in HTML5, Sass, CSS3, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.

• Eye for detail when transforming prototypes to actual pages.

• Create technical specifications and test plans.

• Investigate and develop skills in modern technologies.

 

 

Specific Skills and Responsibilities:

Must be strong in HTML, SASS, and Bootstrap. JavaScript is a plus.

 

Onebridge offers competitive compensation and access to a comprehensive program which includes: Medical, Dental, Vision, Flexible PTO, Holiday Pay, and 401K.

Summary:

You will be responsible for ensuring that the user-experience and overall product vision is carried out through the entire application.  The role consists of working closely with the design team to turn screens, pages, user-interface components, and interaction states in to functional code. You should be experienced in using the latest techniques to build rich, interactive, modern web applications but rooted in development standards and best practices.  This includes performing analysis on architecture and desired application end-state to determine the best framework, API's and tools to use in each situation.  You should be able to contribute value both through strategic thinking / thought leadership and through daily execution of tasks/assignments. You will work closely with Product Owner, UX / UI Designers and other developers in a highly-collaborative, agile, environment.
 
Duties & Responsibilities:
Work on front-end development activities, solutions, methods, and practices.
Works with product team to understand project requirements
Transpose sketches, wireframes, mock-ups into working code
Build and test reusable code and libraries for future use

Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end

Experience with other frameworks such as Bootstrap, Foundation, Material-UI, etc.
Experience integrating with REST APIs

The company will only employ candidates who are legally authorized to work in the United States for this position. Individuals with temporary visas such as E, F-1, H-1, H-2, L, B, J, or TN or who need sponsorship for work authorization now or in the future are not eligible for hire.

Stratacent is all about delivering world class IT solutions that are perfectly aligned to client needs, no matter how complex they may be. We are highly focused on our customers and our primary goal is 
to exceed expectations with every client who partners with us, with solutions that are innovative, practical and versatile enough to take their business to the next level. We follow the highest standards 
of professional ethics, delivering quality on time every time. Across every project we strive to deliver reliable, scalable and agile solutions to clients' technology needs integrating our core values of 
excellence, commitment, collaboration and creativity. Our offsite development center is located at 101 Hudson Street, Jersey City, NJ a building covering 1.25 million square feet of space in a "Class A* 
office tower 42 stories high, looming over the Hudson River/NYC Skyline and just 10 minutes from Wall Street in lower Manhattan.

We are looking for a Front End/Web Developer for one of our projects in Financial Services

Job Description
* Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine design with the art of programming. The ideal candidate will have a passion for building great user-facing features, bridging the gap 
between design and technical implementations, and a love for working in a collaborate environment with likeminded individuals.

Responsibiltes
* Working in a collaborative team environment to deliver on current projects and help implement user-facing features. With this balance in mind you will be:

* Working in an agile environment with product owners and a small development team to meet project deliveries.
* Employ engineering practices that ensure a clean, maintainable and extensible code-base.
* Supporting a strong culture of collaboration and technical excellence.

Experience Required

* Knowledge of templating frameworks like ERB, HAML, or SLIM.
* A passion for responsive designs and a strong attention to detail in building user-facing features across multiple browsers.
* Proven problem-solving skills and the ability to respond quickly to evolving requirements. 
* An inquisitive mind and continuous learner to maintain a sustainable delivery culture.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

* JavaScript (ECMAScipt 6)

* React

Frontend.jobDescription:
VALiNTYRY is seeking a full time Front End UI / UX Designer / Developer (Drupal) in Orlando, FL.



When you apply, please provide a link or examples of your Drupal work.



GENERAL SUMMARY:

The Front End UI / UX Designer is responsible for the execution of creative and digital deliverables.

 The initial project will be to coordinate and consolidate disparate technologies and websites and help unify them with new branding, messaging, and structure using Drupal.

 Ongoing projects will include CMS Migrations, adaptations, mini-sites and multi-faceted campaign support.

 You'll work on a small team of experts to rapidly deliver designs, templates, and landing pages to our clients.

 We need someone who can translate designs and wireframes into working landing pages and websites in Drupal / WordPress and can understand the BIG PICTURE and begin with the end in mind.

 Great design and usability is your passion.


PRINCIPAL DUTIES AND JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:

Adhere to and maintain brand standards and its integral role in the organization, providing quality assurance of creative deliverables.

 Build and maintain positive rapport with clients and team members, partner agencies, photographers, and other vendors.

 Maintain accurate and orderly records of jobs produced and attaching final artwork to closed jobs electronically in the Creative Management software program, delivering hard copy files to production/ traffic manager upon job completion and in a timely manner. 

 Monitor and update the status of jobs assigned on a daily basis through the utilization of Creative Management software program and communicate to leadership and/or production/ traffic manager if a project will not be completed on schedule.


 EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE REQUIRED:

Bachelor's degree or art school equivalent and 3 years of progressive experience in design and development


REQUIRED COMPETENCIES:

Portfolio with examples of exceptional digital design capabilities and collaborations

 Advanced capabilities with Drupal or related CMS, MS Office, HTML 5, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, Adobe CC, Drupal, InDesign, Adobe Illustrator, WordPress, Unbounce, Photoshop, and other Mac software

 Established technical knowledge of various media such as web, social media ad design, video, interactive, branded email marketing, etc.

 Fundamental knowledge of creative, advertising, marketing strategy, and promotion

 Ability to work well autonomously and with others using tact and diplomacy

 Strong oral and written communication skills

 Proven ability to successfully manage concurrent projects; work in a fast-paced and complex environment; execute large projects; and work under multiple and competing deadlines

 Strong attention to detail throughout revisions and final approvals





For immediate response please forward resumes to dmartinek@valintry.com

 

Dan Martinek

Sr. IT Recruiter

(Direct) 407-205-1127

(Office) 800-360-1407
www.valintry.com



For a list of our current openings please visit Valintry's Jobs Webpage

Frontend.jobDescription:
Senior Front End Developer 
Charlotte, NC  





Red Ventures is seeking a  Senior Front End Developer 
 that will bring to life unique user experiences across digital platforms, products and devices at our location in Fort Mill, SC (relocation assistance provided). You will push the envelope to continuously innovate the interactive and mobile user experiences. You will challenge your peers as much as they will challenge you in an environment where Engineers, UX/UI Designers and Data Strategists join forces to kick ass.   


We may be Red Ventures, but we hate red tape. Set your path, see your impact, and grow with us.   

Principle duties & responsibilities:  

Develop the scope and timelines for all front-end code tasks/projects 
Owns projects -   Make the high-level, critical technical decisions regarding the front-end UI of any site/application/project supported 
Support fellow team members in the completion of their assigned tasks 
Provide mentorship and the transfer of knowledge to fellow team members 
Provide expert technical direction, communication, and feedback to the business team 
Strong business acumen / tech translator  
Design strategic solutions 

Required technical experience: 

5-7+ years of professional relevant experience in the role building websites, the front-end interfaces of web applications, or the like.  
Foundation: HTML5, CSS (SASS preferred), JavaScript (vanilla or jQuery at a minimum) 
Git version control 
Build systems – Gulp (preferred), Grunt, Webpack (second preference), npm, bower 
Adobe Illustrator/Photoshop and Sketch (where the designs come from) 

Expert knowledge and practical implementation of: 

Semantic mark-up using HTML5 
CSS through the use of pre-processors such as LESS, SASS, etc. 
JavaScript through either vanilla (a plus) or at least jQuery 
Can develop fully responsive websites (using CSS media queries… JS-based solutions not accepted as meeting this criteria) 
Create clean, well organized and structured code in all of the above 
Advanced debugging and trouble-shooting skills 
Experience with build tools (Grunt, Gulp, npm, bower, Webpack) 
Experience with version control tools (Git) 
Expert ability to scope and timeline a technical front-end project with the understanding and ability to gather the necessary inputs on their own 
Expert ability to make the right technical decisions to build a solution meeting the requirements (expertise in technical options/approaches combined with project requirements and constraints) 
Have the capability to architect a performant, scalable, and reliable technical solution to meet business needs and technical constraints 
Understanding of further reaching technical concepts (API’s, modular concepts, modular CSS, JS etc. 
Influential communicator with technical and non-technical individuals 
Share their knowledge and grow fellow developers through documentation, code reviews, mentorship, and training 
Can work autonomously and self-initiated 

Things that will impress us:  
 
Advanced-to-expert knowledge of Web standards, semantics, and advanced concepts such as asynchronous development, repeatable patterns, modular concepts 
React.js/Vue.js expertise (these two are preferred, but Angular would get some points) 
Ability to architect and develop their own API’s 
Ability to architect and develop build scripts (Gulp and Webpack preferred) 
Ability to develop Progressive Web Apps (PWAs), Electron apps, React Native apps, or mobile native apps 
Ability to somewhat cross the threshold into the backend (those that go more full-stack) 
Practical Implementation of Web Accessibility Standards (compliance with WCAG 2.0 Level AA preferred) 
Knowledge of Digital Marketing acumen concepts and principles (SEO, SEM, PPC, etc) 
Building their own side projects showing more advanced skills 
Contributing to an open source project 
Volunteering time educating/mentoring fellow developers 
Why Red Ventures? 


We don’t do things because “that’s the way we’ve always done it.” We evaluate every process, and fix what doesn’t work. We solve business problem because we are a culture of Doers. We care less about roles and more about solutions that move us forward. You will have the opportunity to challenge yourself and grow.  


On our 630,000 square foot campus, good becomes great.  We believe in work/life balance. We offer a ton of competitive perks, including:
Competitive pay 
Opportunities for leadership and career progression 
Open PTO policy 
Brand new Learning & Development Center 
401k matching 
Family-friendly health, dental, and vision insurance 
Outdoor amphitheater and jogging/bike trail 
Onsite health center 
Health and wellness programs and classes 
Onsite gyms, basketball court, yoga studio, and bowling alley 
Other perks (just ask!)  

Next Steps 



If Red Ventures sounds like the place for you, please submit an application. Also, feel free to share if you have a presence online with a blog, Twitter, GitHub, Dribbble or other platform.   


#CB   Apply Now

Technology


Our technology team works fast and smart. We love what we do and we have fun doing it. The Technology group is comprised of motivated self-starters and true team players that are absolutely integral to the growth of our future success.

Provide training and professional development opportunities for full-time employees
Demonstrate our Sephora values of Passion for Client Service, Innovation, Expertise, Balance, Respect for All, Teamwork, and Initiative.

 is a plus

 and technologies

Frontend.jobDescription:
Our company was founded on the principle that design and technology work to create superior user experiences. We believe that all great experiences are derived from a deep understanding of how people use products. It is our mission to continually raise the bar for how UX and technology services are delivered, as well as advance the tools needed to create, manage and support enterprise-wide user experience initiatives.

Our experienced, multidisciplinary teams are expected to deliver custom solutions and strategies for our clients. We are not an agency or resourcing company.

 


Roles, Descriptions & Profiles:


 


We focus on the complicated
 stuff
 — We solve complex problems by developing enterprise portals and tools, transactional infrastructure and interfaces, and e-commerce solutions.

 

We work directly with clients
 — We do not rely on others to translate requirements and feedback. We hear it directly from the source.

 


We develop expertise across industries
 — Our client's industries include: financial services, healthcare, higher education, insurance, manufacturing, publishing, real estate, retail infrastructure, technology,

travel, and more.

 


What we value
 – We value team members who are: kind, passionate, empathic, and collaborative. We hire people who continue to learn, and are willing to engage within our company to evolve and improve

 


Responsibilities


• Advise clients on front-end strategy, framework selection, emerging technology.

• Contribute to the development of our internal tools and reusable architecture.

• Be a change agent. Help move our design, development, and delivery processes into the next generation.

• Develop front-end code based on wireframes, visual designs, and UX specifications.

• Use front-end frameworks such as: React, Angular, Ember, Vue, etc.

• Integrate with REST APIs or other back-end frameworks.

• Accurately estimate upcoming work and deliver reliably.

• Be a mentor to junior developers.

 


Must Have

JavaScript
 - Demonstrable mastery of JavaScript, and experience with one or more front-end frameworks:

React, Angular, Ember, Vue, etc.
HTML
 - Mastery of HTML: semantics, accessibility, and cross-browser compatibility.
CSS
 - Mastery of CSS, including preprocessors (Sass preferred), naming methodologies such as BEM, and

techniques for scaling CSS on large projects.
Automation
 - Familiarity using Node libraries to ensure code quality: JSLint, JSHint, ESLint.
Testing
 - Experience with JS unit testing approaches, such as: Jest, Jasmine, Mocha, etc.
Performance
 - Experience creating code optimized for production, via JS minification, "tree shaking"

dependencies, image compression, etc.
Collaboration
 - Ability to collaborate with team members across various disciplines: UX, design, tech,

business, QA, etc.
Planning
 - Experience planning and estimating complex software application projects.
Source Control
 - Familiarity with source control: Git, SVN, etc.
Experience
 - We prefer 5+ years of experience for lead roles.

 


Preferred


• BS/BA degree with CS concentration, or equivalent experience.

• Back-end development experience in Node or Java is helpful.

• Experience with front-end build tools: Webpack, Grunt, Gulp, or JSPM.

 


Projects


Employees will be exposed to many clients and technologies as they complete projects. This will give them many opportunities to grow and stretch themselves. We are committed to training and mentoring to help them be successful.

 

Travel


Candidate should be comfortable with occasional travel as client engagement requires.

Are you a Senior Front-End Engineer with extensive Javascript experience & a passion for Ember.js?  If so, read on....

We are a new kind of health brand.  We believe in simplicity and ingredients that work best in the body.  You deserve to know exactly what you're getting and where it's coming from.

This is an exciting opportunity and critical role for a very fast-growing brand.  We believe that great digital experiences are an important part of any company's success, and we think you'll agree.  You'll have the autonomy to explore what that ought to look like while working across the company to ensure that good technology is enabling all teams in an appropriately scaled fashion.  Oh, and all the while ensure we are continuing to regularly deliver new features and iterations.

What You Will Be Doing

- You will be the one who calls the shots for everything front-end web. This includes short and mid-term projects that will immediately move key company metrics as well as laying the technical foundation for long-term success.
- Lead the design, architecture, and execution of everything front-end web.
- Establish engineering processes, define company engineering standards, identify and implement core technologies, and remove technical hurdles. 
- Work directly with our other Engineers, Designers, and Product and Marketing teams to implement core features.
- Build solutions for appropriate scalability. You're ok building something "hacky" if it fits the need, but can also call out real issues and create elegant, scalable solutions for them.

What You Need for this Position

- Front-end focused.
- You get hyped about CSS animations, great transitions, and the overall possibility of the web. 
- You pride yourself on code cleanliness and structure, and you know that your best code is ahead of you.
- You love new technologies that make your work life better, things like Sass, Handlebars, and modern Javascript libraries like Ember.js and Vue.js. Sometimes, you may even like to grab an animation library and play with animating graphs or typography, you know, for fun.
- Fast learner. Ok, so maybe you haven't done 100% on the list above, but you can pick up new things and for you learning curves are more like runways.
- Data driven. You believe that great data enables you and others to make better decisions, and sometimes that button should be a darker shade because nobody is clicking on it.
- Communicator. You can dive deep in the weeds and have complex technical conversations with your engineering team, nerd out over design decisions, then turn around and explain those same conversations to Marketing, Customer Experience, Business, and our CEO.So if you are a Senior Front-End Engineer with extensive Javascript experience & a passion for Ember.js....APPLY TODAY!

Frontend.jobDescription:
This is a late stage Sequoia - funded Enterprise Cloud Software startup with 65 employees and massive momentum and headroom to grow.  The executive leadership has worked together in the past with several past successes, including their latest Enterprise Software Product company which exited for $400M to Symantec.  The CTO is on his fourth startup with the previous three all being successful exits to Brocade, Lucent and Symantec.  The company has received $40M in funding in two rounds.  
 
This team has identified another untapped Enteprise software market captialization on Big Data, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.  On top of this very sophisticiated platform, there is an extremely easy to use front end, either mobile or desktop browser.  In fact for many users, this solution replaces interaction with salesforce software.
 
High profile customers include:  Cisco, vmware, Dropbox, Juniper, Aruba, BlueCoat, nimblestorage, box, zendesk and many others.
 
We are looking for a mid to senior Front End (with light Fullstack duties - 80% Front End / 20% B/E interface) who will focus on implementing many different areas of our solution, including but not limited to our overall front end implementation. 
 
You will be joining a super-talented team led by seasoned executives who have a proven track record of consistently delivering award-winning, world-class products to enterprise customers.
 
The company prides itself on offering a great work life balance to team members.

Qualifications
5+ years of professional web and / or mobile web application development experience using Javascript and Javascript frameworks like React or Angular
Strong understanding of web-based architectures - especially front end focused.
Experience in Java interface development in support of front end.
Experience building and using RESTful APIs

Nice to Have
Familiarity with large - scale business intelligence and / or Enterprise applications
Advanced performance optimization and profiling skills for a large distributed cloud based applications.
Familiarity of JavaScript and other web technologies including XHTML, CSS, Ajax, JQuery, etc.
 
Up-to-date knowledge of latest trends in web application development, including Amazon AWS ecosystem

Projects 

Employees will be exposed to many clients and technologies as they complete projects. This will give them many opportunities to grow and stretch themselves. We are committed to training and mentoring to help them be successful. 


Travel 

Candidate should be comfortable with occasional travel as client engagement requires.

Currently, a client of ours is looking for a Lead Front-End Developer to perform a wide range of tasks including development of new applications, testing, configuring and interfacing with various financial systems. Our client looks for craftsmen Front-End Developers who are motivated to take ownership of their code and deliver high-quality user experiences. You have a positive attitude, thrive on challenging yourself, and contribute to process and product improvement. 5-10 yrs of Front End Development
Angular 2,4 or 5 (NO 1), AWS, HTML, CSS, Webpack or similiar tool, CICD, Agile
Architecting the framework
Developing a new web site

Samples of work a plus - but not needed
No employee Management - will lead the project direction

 

Intelligent Capital Network, Inc. is a staffing firm focused on the most important part of the industry-PEOPLE. We are dedicated to attracting the area's most talented IT and marketing professionals. At ICN we use the term partnering when describing relationships with our consultants. That is because we invest the time to understand the motivating force behind each consultant, provide consultants with a strong understanding of our clients' projects and strive to match each consultant with a project which will satisfy the consultant's short and long term needs. Only by connecting the best consultants to the best projects is ICN able to drive the New Economy. ICN has been able to identify, attract and develop intimate relationships with the most exciting projects throughout the Mid Atlantic Region. Frontend.skills: HTML, CSS, AJAX, JavaScript, jQuery, Angular, Bootstrap, Dojo, Backbone, Node.js, React, NoSQL, SQL
Frontend.jobDescription:
PeerSource is currently recruiting for a Senior Front End Engineer
on a Direct Hire
 basis for our client in Newtown, PA, but for the right candidate there is possibility of full-time telecommuting from the greater northeastern-US area.

 

Summary


 

This is a unique opportunity to join a growing team building the next generation of cognitive computing and big data analytics capabilities. These new capabilities will drive a state-of-the-art platform and services which will provide customers and business partners with actionable insights and analytics to improve performance, reduce risks and provide measurable competitive advantages, across domains such as supply chain management, sales strategy, and consumer marketing.

 

Responsibilities

The Sr. Front-end / Web Application Engineer will be joining a team accountable for the execution of products and services involving cognitive computing and advanced analytics.
Independently performs analysis to develop and implement high-level front-end designs for assigned projects.
Collaboration with graphic designers on look and feel, but should be able to provide basic designs if needed
Creation of applicable wire-frames
Development of specific features and functions where needed
Development in a manner that supports reusable code and libraries for use across the company’s projects and platforms
Validation/assessment of technical feasibility of UI/UX approaches and designs
Optimization for performance and scalability
Validation of front-end collected data prior to submission to back-end for processing
Remains current on industry standards in web development
Ability to research, develop and propose new technologies to improve application architecture
Finds and recommends opportunities for continuous improvement
Authors technical documentation
Drives the development of technical standards

Required Skills

7+ years of current hands-on web application architecture, design, and development experience with deep knowledge in the following areas: JavaScript, ECMAScript 6 /7/ 8, and libraries such as jQuery, AngularJS, Bootstrap, Dojo, Backbone, Node.js, or others
Experience with React / Redux / Sagas,Webpack / Babel,Message Queues / RabittMQ, and NoSQL databases such as MongoDB (preferred), Cassandra, or HBase
Experience in HTML5, CSS3, AJAX and responsive web design concepts
Experience working in a highly collaborative team environment with agile best practices such as TDD, continuous integration, and automated testing and deployment
Experience with cross-browser and cross-device compatibility and browser-specific issues
Proficient in working with data encoding formats such as JSON and XML
Working knowledge of SQL
Experience with Automated UI testing
Experience with Apache and Tomcat in a Linux environment
Knowledge of code versioning tools, such Git
Working knowledge of the current cloud computing environments
Minimum of a Bachelors Degree Required (Masters Preferred) in Computer Science or related field.

No third parties.   Sorry, relocation is not available for this position.


H1 sponsorship is not available.


 

PeerSource, a Denver based technology recruiting firm, values strong relationships with talented professionals!  We offer contract, contract-to-hire and direct hire opportunities throughout the US and support W2 as well independent consultants working on a Corp-to-Corp basis.  Sorry, but at this time we do not work with other agencies representing their own Corp-to-Corp candidates.  W2 employee benefits with PeerSource include options for health & dental insurance, a matching retirement plan as well as reimbursements for education and training related expenses!  Contact us for more details.
